case.name: 曲线-风场设置_多个值_list
case.desc: 预测功率,置信上限,置信下限

step.cmdparas: select round(p,3) from hdrfcstdata_longtoufdc where fcst_time = '2022-04-01 00:00:00' and daytype =2 and powertype =4 ~QMYSQL~10.8.8.21@_@_@_~4

case.name: 曲线-风场设置_多个值_list
case.desc: 预测功率,置信上限,置信下限

step.cmdparas: select round(p,3),round(limit_upper,3),round(limit_lower,3) from hdrfcstdata_longtoufdc where fcst_time = '2022-04-01 00:00:00' and daytype =2 and powertype =4 ~QMYSQL~_~3
